commands.content:
The example of swaping SOL to USDC using ORCA Swap

### Pool
1. ORCA Swap program id: 3xQ8SWv2GaFXXpHZNqkXsdxq5DZciHBz6ZFoPPfbFd7U
2. SOL to USDC pool address: 8DT1oKJPHcdJzdSf3cb2WT7L8eRjLUJeDFSe7M2QDtQE
3. Pool authority address: BVSZP6RsqAtjvuJrXYsYN5U4XY7pLwW4PawfgVPkLbjN
4. Token A: 4ShvTPQ3jYZzwUpxoQFSCDZxLtxQYNPUfeL3sR9mzLjJ
5. Token B: 9eKgmUSfTkQLRBvowV9zjY3BbhAQVaGSw1jfon5UwUJM
6. Fee: HPzaLqtZGhTbs7WcdGMfLswKze28W75nrYytNSw7qdvi
7. Pool token mint: 4GpUivZ2jvZqQ3vJRsoq5PwnYv6gdV9fJ9BzHT2JcRr7

Token program id: TokenkegQfeZyiNwAJbNbGKPFXCWuBvf9Ss623VQ5DA

[Link](https://github.com/orca-so/typescript-sdk/blob/e503a7f7a2b6ca4d5052f4b3d927273ee70259cc/src/constants/devnet/pools.ts)

### **Swap instruction**:

Keys: 
0. [] Token-swap
1. [] swap authority
2. [] user transfer authority
3. [writable] token_(A|B) SOURCE Account, amount is transferable by user transfer authority,
4. [writable] token_(A|B) Base Account to swap INTO.  Must be the SOURCE token.
5. [writable] token_(A|B) Base Account to swap FROM.  Must be the DESTINATION token.
6. [writable] token_(A|B) DESTINATION Account assigned to USER as the owner.
7. [writable] Pool token mint, to generate trading fees
8. [writable] Fee account, to receive trading fees
9. [] Token program id
10. [optional, writable] Host fee account to receive additional trading fees

Data:
1. amount_in: u64 - Minimum amount of DESTINATION token to output, prevents excessive slippage
2. minimum_amount_out: u64


Links:
1. [Swap instruction](https://github.com/orca-so/solana-program-library/blob/master/token-swap/program/src/instruction.rs).
2. [Pools](https://github.com/orca-so/typescript-sdk/blob/main/src/constants/devnet/pools.ts)

Because SOL must be as token for swaping program, we will create a wrapped SOL account using PDA

SOL mint address: So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112
